nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_859_0

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_860_0

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_863_0

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_864_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The boys at my school used to make fun of me because I have a flat nose.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_865_0
